content: There’s a part of me that says “Go ahead…make the environment a states rights thing. That way, it will only be the red states that see a big rise in deaths of their citizens due to the poisons in their air and water.” The only people who will be helped are the corporations who don’t care about dumping toxic waste and killing their customers. The only bad part of that is that once the corporations and Republican donors have killed all of their constituents, the blue states will have to come in and try and clean up the mess…as usual.
